title: description
Ke$ha's Beach R Who We R: A damn variant of the Havana Beach Cocktail. As serious as Ke$ha's cars.

title: notes
Ke$ha's Beach R Who We R: Rum, Pineapple and a hint of dj.

title: pairing
Ke$ha's Beach R Who We R: Ke$ha has it with a hot Salami and profiterole.

title: serving_suggestion
Ke$ha's Beach R Who We R: Serve in a cocktail glass (4.5 oz). Drink to the serious sounds of We R Who We R.
